functionDescription: The function attempts to convert a Lua value at a given stack index to a string, updating the string length if provided.

inputInterfaces.name: idx
inputInterfaces.meaning: Index on the stack of the value to be converted to a string

inoutInterfaces.name: L
inoutInterfaces.meaning: The Lua state in which the operation is performed

inoutInterfaces.name: len
inoutInterfaces.meaning: Pointer to store the length of the resulting string, if not NULL
